EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Testing Across Devices with Tosca Mobile Plus - 2015.06.25.Email - Fol
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our Testing Across Devices with Tosca Testsuite Mobile+ webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Testing Across Devices with Tosca Mobile+
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our recent webinar, “Testing Across Devices with Tosca Testsuite Mobile+”. In the webinar, Georg Thurner, Tricentis’ Mobile+ Product Manager, showed how Tosca Testsuite Mobile+ provides cutting edge end-to-end testing solutions for mobile apps.
If you would like to see what you missed, a recording of our webinar is available here <http://www.tricentis.com/thank-you-page-testing-across-devices-tosca-mobile-plus>.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Best regards, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Georg Thurner Product Manager Tricentis
